title: ISic000375. I.Sicily inscription 000375
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus) ((·)) s(acrum)
Statia ((·)) Myrtis
vix(it) ((ivy-leaf)) ann(is) ((ivy-leaf)) XLV
Sporidas ((·)) mar(itus) ((·))
5coniug(i) ((·)) cariss(imae)

Apparatus criticus

Text from CIL

English translation

Sacred to the gods of the underworld. Statia Myrtis lived for 45 years. Sporidas, her husband, (dedicated this) to his most beloved wife

commentary
